1.content:
After school, on the way home, a young student passes by an old man running a lottery. The student would have just passed by if he/she did not notice what the prize was. The winner gets to go to the Circus of Desire, the most exclusive circus that has ever existed.

There are a few reasons why this circus is different from others.One such reason is that it is always open, and it never leaves where it is located; while a vast forest that is surrounded by a giant wall is located right outside the city. It is very difficult to get tickets to this circus.

So this student tries his/her luck, and just happens to win. Now he/she (and some friends?) will be allowed access to this legendary circus.

Next day Saturday morning....

He/she is standing right outside the main entrance. Sure, getting into this place is everyone's dream, at least from his/her school, however, there are as many rumors about this place as its popularity.......

After handing over the ticket he/she (and party?) enter and the gates close behind him/her.

There, in front of the winner are markers, pointing the way to some of this places attractions.......


"Welcome to the Circus of Desires, where everything you could ever want lies just beyond these gates"
1.title: Winner.

11111.content:
Your name is Eric, and being 18, you’re probably a little bit old to love clowns. Your father used to take you to circuses all the time, and thus, clowns remind you of your childhood, and make you nostalgic for simpler times. Unfortunately, most people find clowns creepy, and think you’re immature or weird for liking them, so you’ve mostly kept it to yourself. When you got your hands on a backstage pass at the greatest circus in the world, though, you knew you couldn’t pass up the opportunity. You wanted to meet one of the clowns, and ask them how they pull off all their amazing tricks and feats of aerobics.

You excitedly march towards some trailers in a backlot of the circus. You see trailers for all kinds of staff members, and even pass by a few lions and elephants, but eventually, you came across one with two smiling, female clowns painted along the side, along with the words; One’s hungry, one’s busty! Together, they’re the Yoyo Sisters! That was a little weird, but you were more intrigued by the prospect of female clowns. You don’t think you’ve ever seen or heard of those before. Strange. Without further ado, you nervously knock on the trailer door, grasping the ticket in your hand.

You gasp when the door opens to reveal the tallest woman you’ve ever seen! She must be at least 8 feet! Like any other clown, her skin was painted white, but her hair and makeup were vividly purple. Her mismatched clown costume was also various, subdued shades of blue and purple, rather than the while reds and yellows you’d expect from a clown. Most notably, though, was her, uh, ‘physique’. She had a perfect hourglass figure, with wide hips and humongous, round breasts, her outfit shamelessly revealing her cleavage. “Oh! Well, look what we have here,” she smirked, speaking in a surprisingly calm and velvety voice as she bends down to face you eye-level. “If it isn’t a precious little human…”

Before you can respond, you hear an excited voice from deeper in the trailer. “A human!?” You gawk as another, similarly sized clown rounds the corner. She was about the same height, and looked more like a typical clown, with orange hair, a big red noise, and a typical red-and-yellow outfit. Compared to the other clown, she had a huge pear shape, meaning her breasts were a lot smaller… but her hips and belly were absolutely gigantic! Each was bigger than your entire body, and they jiggled as she ran towards you, a huge smile on her face. “Ohmygosh! You are the most adorable little thing I’ve ever seen!”

She lifted you up in the air with incredible ease, before hugging you against her pudgy, pillowy body like you were some sort of teddy bear. “Ah! P-put me down!” You cry out. Immediately, the purple-haired one grabs you from her hands, and places you gently on the ground.

“Excuse my sister, here. She can get a little… carried away sometimes,” she chuckled, before stepping aside, allowing you to enter their trailer. “Please, come in, sweetie. Make yourself at home. I presume you have a backstage pass?”

“Y-yes, I do,” you nervously reply, handing her your ticket as you step into their trailer. It was a lot bigger on the inside then it looked like on the outside. To accommodate the clown womens’ height, not only was the ceiling quite high, but all the furniture was massive. You watch as the pudgy one hops over onto the couch, which can barely contain her massive hips. “Why do you keep calling me ‘human’? Aren’t you humans, too?”

“We’re not humans, silly! We’re clowns!” She giggles.

“W-what do you mean?” You ask, your confusion only growing by the second.

“Other circuses just have people just dressed up in clown masks… but not this one!” She smiles, kicking her feet up. “This circus imports genuine clowns straight from the clown planet! They really spare no expense!”

You stare at her. You’re not sure if she’s joking, or if she’s crazy. “Is that supposed to be why you’re so tall?”

“Mm. Handsome and observant…” The other clown coos. You shiver as she bends over and massages your shoulders from behind. “Anyway, allow us to introduce ourselves. I’m Lulu.”

“And I’m Popsy!” The orange-haired clown introduces herself, shaking your hand roughly. Lulu leads you over to the couch, and sets you down in the middle as she takes a seat beside you. Soon, you were squeezed up uncomfortably inbetween them as they watched TV. Popsy was chowing down on a seemingly endless amount of corn dogs, almost swallowing each one down before immediately grabbing another. Meanwhile, Lulu was simply relaxing and painting her nails. Neither seemed like particularly clown-like behavior. You were starting to regret coming here.

“So, uh…” You eventually work up the courage to ask. “Are you two going to do something funny, or…?”

“Oh? Just ‘cause we’re clowns, we have to be funny all the time?” Popsy pouts. “I’ll have you know that’s a stereotype!”

“W-well, no! But…” You stuttered, only for Lulu to reassuringly hook an arm around you, pulling you up against her side.

“It’s alright. I must apologize if this is not the backstage experience you were expecting,” Lulu says. “We just got back from a big show a few minutes ago, so we’re pretty burned out. If you want, though, we can show you around the circus…”

You sigh. “That sounds fun, I guess.” Maybe this won’t be so bad...
11111.title: The Yoyo Sisters

111111.content:
Before you knew it, the two women were escorting you around the circus grounds, excitedly explaining every building you cross by. Of course, you were more interested in them then in the circus. When you got an opportunity, you decided to ask them about their clown work. “So, um… what’s it like? You know, working for the circus?”

“Excellent. Couldn’t imagine a better job,” Lulu smiled. “Making people smile is a dream come true in and of itself… but the paycheck definitely doesn’t disappoint, either.”

“Oh? What kind of stunts do you do?” You ask.

“Well, all sorts of things really, though the trapeze and tightrope walking are my passions…”

“Really? I love those!” You smile, immediately perking up. “I always wondered what the secret is.”

“There’s no secret. It’s all balance and aerobics,” she chuckles. “Luckily, us clowns are natural at both, if it’s for the sake of making people smile.”

You’re a little deflated when she starts talking about clowns as if they’re another species again. You didn’t know if they were joking or what, but you wished they’d just talk like normal people. “Maybe you could show me what you can do later?”

“Sounds fun,” she nods.

You turn to the chubbier, more bubbly clown, Popsy. “How about you? What kind of stunts do you do?”

She gets a huge smile on her face the moment you talk to her. “You know sword swallowers?”

“Yeah, I know what sword swallowers are,” you nod. obviously.

“Well, I’m like that, except I can swallow anything! Swords, chainsaws, molten lava, audience members…” She excitedly slaps her huge belly, giggling as she watches it jiggle. “My tummy can handle anything you throw at it!”

“W-wait…” You do a double-take. “Audience members? You mean, people?”

“Yep! Gobbling up a few people from the crowd is a real showstopper!” She smiles. You notice that her mouth is indeed more than large enough to swallow someone… and her belly large enough to fit someone inside, for that matter. “It’s my most popular trick!”

“A-are they okay afterwards?” You ask, not sure whether she’s joking or not.

“Better than okay! They get to be part of all this!” She says, running her hands over her pudgy thighs. You shudder as you realize the implications of what she just said. You want to just make your excuses and leave, but before you can, Lulu speaks up.

“There’s the tent up ahead. It should be empty, but our equipment’s still there,” she says, pointing up to a large tent up ahead. “Perhaps we could show you our tricks, if you’re so curious?”

Before you could answer, Popsy rushes excitedly forward. “Oo! Oo! Me first! Me first!” Lulu follows along after her, and you, reluctantly, follow too.

Who was going to show you their tricks first?
111111.title: Stunts

11211.content:
Terry just couldn't believe his luck as he walked through the main grounds of the circus. Somehow, against all the odds, he was one of the few people in town to receive a ticket that allowed access to the famous, yet mysterious, circus everyone talked about. He knew of some people that managed to gain entrance at some point but they refused to revile anything to him and would always say, "You have to see if for yourself to believe !" Now it was time to see if this place can live up to all the hype.

So far it didn't look all that different from any regular old circus; not that he found anything wrong with that mind you. In fact there was quite a fair bit of people here despite the rarity of the tickets.

He was quickly broken out of his thoughts by the trumpeting sound of an elephant. Terry smiled and made his way over to where he heard the noise. He was always a big lover of animals and would always try to go see them first whenever he went to places like these. Heck it was one of the few reasons why he would try to apply for a job at places like vets or zoos.

It take didn't him long to find the elephant section. Right off the bat he could a couple of elephants just milling about by themselves. The odd thing was that none of them with either in a pin or even tied to anything to keep them from wondering off. 'These guys must have been trained really well if no one is going to keep an eye on them', Terry thought to himself.

Not too far from the herd, he saw something that just put a big old grin on his face.

An elephant was trudging around the area with a load of a passengers on top of its' back. Of course they would have elephant rides here, why wouldn't they? Terry remembered the one time he rode one when he was about 10 years old; oh the nostalgia was coming back to him. He wanted to ride one so badly, but curiosity was getting the better of him regarding the other elephants. Something about how nonchalant everyone was really made want to get closer.

113111221121111.title: Only one at a time.

1131112211211112.content: Will it be Megan? Or will Eve be on her own?
1131112211211112.title: Megan/Eve.

113111221121112.content: WILL YOU GO TOGETHER? OR WILL YOU SPLIT UP?
113111221121112.title: All 3 of them can enter.

1131112211211121.content:
AND WE HAVE IT! THE 3 OF THEM WILL ENTER THE HAUNTED HOUSE TOGETHER! HOW MANY OF THEM WILL MAKE IT OUT? OR WILL THEY SUFFER THE SAME FATE AS THE OTHERS?

"Well, here we go", says Keith, as the 3 of them enter the haunted house.

The entrance was filled with creepy figures, lights, and mist covers the floor.
Megan: ".....Ok, this is kinda creepy".
Eve: "Yeah, they did pretty good job".
"Thats right, Megan hates these things, but you like them".
Eve: "Of course. Who doesn't like a good scare?".
Megan: "Me".
"Heh. Huh? Looks like there are a few doors to pick from".
Eve: "So we have a choice.....Do we stay together and pick a door? Or do we split up and each take one of these countless doors that lead to who knows where?".
1131112211211121.title: The entrance.

11311122112111211.content:
"I dont think we should split up".
Megan: "Y-yeah! We should do this together!".
Eve: "Hmmm. Maybe. By what that guy said, theres probably going to be a test in whichever room we choose. If we stick together, we could have a greater chance of solving it".
"So we do this as a team".
Megan & Eve: "Yeah!/Sounds good.".

They pick a door and enter the first room.
11311122112111211.title: Sticking together.

113111221121112111.content:
The door automatically shuts and locks behind them.

The room seems very simple. The walls, floor, and ceiling are white. They can see the next door on the other side, and there is a red circular platform right in front of them, big enough for one of them to stand on.

Eve: "That door is probably locked".
Megan: "Really?".
"Yeah, Eve's probably right. We're going to have to do something to go to the next room".

Megan: "Be careful", she says, as Keith gets on the platform.

The entire room begins to shake.

4 more red platforms appear in the room. 2 in the middle, 1 in the air, and one by the door.

Eve: "Great. A puzzle".
Megan: "A puzzle?".
Eve: "Yeah, we probably have to pick the right order to stand on those platforms".
Megan: "D-do you think something will happen if we mess up?".
Eve: "Probably:".
Megan: ".....".
"We'll only one way to find out", Keith says, as he steps off of his platform. The room shakes once more, and the room changes back to how it was.

Megan: "What just happened?".
"I think Its because I stepped off of the platform".
Eve: "Yeah, looks like your going to have to stay on it and we have to solve it".

Keith gets back on and the 4 platforms reappear.

Eve, who is obviously the smartest of the 3, begins to look around the room, trying to figure out which platform is next.....
113111221121112111.title: Room 1.

1131112211211121111.content:
Eve: "Looks like this one is pretty simple",
Megan: "You solved it?".
Eve: "I think". She walks over to the 2 platforms in the middle of the room. "Megan, come here, I think we both need to stand on one".
Megan: "Ok".

They stand on the middle platforms. The platforms that Keith and the 2 girls were standing on suddenly light up. White stairs grow out of the ground and connect to the floating red platform.

Eve: "I thought so".
"But who gets on that one?".
Megan: "Yeah, dont we have to stay on these?".
Eve: "Only we do, Megan. Keith should be able to get off of that one and go up to that platform".

Keith gets off, and nothing happens. "You were right". Climbing the stairs, he gets on the mid-air platform. It lights up, and stairs appear on the opposite side of the platform.
Eve gets off of hers, "Dont move, either of you". She walks to the final platform and gets on.

It lights up, and the sound of a something being unlocked fills the room, followed by "ding ding ding".

Eve: "We solved it. Onto the next room".
1131112211211121111.title: Room 1 solved.

11311122112111211111.content:
They enter the next room.

Megan: "That wasn't so hard".
"Of course not".
Megan: "?".
Eve: "That was only the 1st room. The beginning is always the easiest. Its only going to get harder the farther in we go".
Megan: ".....great.....".

This room was far different. A long hallway, made of stone bricks with torches attached to the walls that are lighting the room.

"What are we suppose to do here?".
Megan: "I dont know. But there is no point in just standing here".
Eve: "Wait!", she yells, but it was too late, Megan takes a few steps forward. One of the bricks she steps on sinks into the floor.

Megan: ".....Oh.....".
11311122112111211111.title: Room 2.

113111221121112111111.content:
The floor opens up beneath Megan. She screams and falls into the dark pit.

Ketih & Eve: "MEGAN!", the scream, and run over to the hole, but by the time they get there, the hole vanishes.
"Dammit! Why did she do that? It was obvious that something was going to happen!".
Eve: "Just calm down, I'm sure she's fine. This is a game. She messed up and was taken out".
"Y-yeah. We just keep going.....How do we get passed this room? Its filled with traps".
Eve: "I guess we can only move forward, slowly and carefully".

They slowly advance down the long hallway, avoiding the corners and testing every brick. Somehow, they make it to the far end and reach the door on the opposite side.

"We made it".
Eve: "Yeah.....".
".....We lost Megan, but thats 2 rooms down. I wonder how many are left.....".
113111221121112111111.title: Room 2 solved.

1131112211211121111111.content:
This room, just like the last 2, is completely different.

Every inch of the room was a light pink and padded. It was also filled with toys, cushions, and other items for babies and kids.

Eve: ".....And another strange room".
"What do you think we have to do in this one?".
Eve: "I dont know. I dont see anything that stands out".
"Maybe we just have to make it to the door, like the last one?".
Eve: "Maybe. But we should be careful".
"Yeah".

Just like the last room, they carefully make there way to the door.
1131112211211121111111.title: Room 3.

11311122112111211111111.content:
With eve in the lead, and almost 1/2 way through, they pass what looks like a changing table with 1 chair and fresh diapers and baby powder.

Eve: "I really dont like this. I'm getting a bad feeling from this place".
"I know. This is creepy".

Not paying attention, one of Keith's legs gets caught in one of the legs of the chair and the table. He trips and lands on the table, and the baby powder. Eve gets a full blast of powder in her face. She backs up, and coughs. "What are you doing?".
"Sorry".
Eve: ".....At least nothing happened".

Keith gets off of the table and looks at Eve, "......".
Eve: "? Whats wrong? Why are you staring at me?".
"I-something seems......off.....I though we were the same height".
Eve: "We are". She stands in front of him and sees that he is barely taller than her. "......or not.....whats going on? You couldn't have grown that much! I know we were the same size yesterday!".
"I-I dont know?.....Wait.....Could it be.....this room?".
Eve: "! Oh god! The powder!".
11311122112111211111111.title: Tripped.

113111221121112111111111.content:
Her entire body starts to burn, she grabs her chest, after falling to her knees. "W-what is this?".
"Eve? Whats going on? Are you ok?".
"Y-yeah", she manages to say. Trying to get up, she trips, but Keith catches her.

They both freeze, something was wrong. Eve's clothes, they barely fit her. Eve thanks him and he lets go. On her feet, they can both clearly see that something has happened to her.

"Y-you shrank?!".
Eve couldn't believe that this happened to her. She backs up, and trips over her baggy pants. Eve falls and hits the side of another table. "Ow, that hur-mmph!". A baby bottle, filled with milk was on the table. When she hit it, the bottle fell off the table and into her open mouth.

Some of the liquid manages to make it in her mouth and down her throat. Eve almost immediately realizes how dangerous it could be and spits it out, trying to cough up as much as possible. But it was too late. The burning sensation returns. "N-no", was all she managed to say as she hits the floor.

She comes to a few minutes later. She wakens, finding herself in Keith's arms and him looking down at her. But she felt.....different, and Keith, he seemed.....bigger.....
113111221121112111111111.title: Is she REALLY shrinking?

1131112211211121111111111.content:
Keith was sitting down, against the wall next to the door on the other side of the room.
"W-what happened? Eve asks, blushing as she lays there, still in his arms.
"You passed out.....but.....".
Eve: "What? Is something wrong?".
".....Listen. Don't panic, but, something happened to you". He lifts her up and puts her on her feet. And she then knew what he meant. He is sitting, but she is on her feet, and they are about the same height.

Eve: "Did I shrink?".
"N-no. I dont think thats it".
Eve thinks about this, and it hits her. She looks behind her and at the room they were still in. "I didn't shrink.....I'm a kid again, aren't I?".
"I think so. That powder and the bottle changed you into a little girl".
Seeing that she was upset, he places his hands on her shoulders. "Look, I'm sure you'll change back. I dont think they'd make anything permanent".
Eve: "Yeah. Your probably right.....Thanks".

Keith get sup, "You ready to go?".
Eve: "Yes. Onto the next room".
1131112211211121111111111.title: Room 3 solved.

11311122112111211111111111.content:
Eve steps out of her over sized clothes, leaving only her now too big shirt covering her. Of course she was embarrassed by this, but what else could she do?

But then Keith surprises her. He bends down and picks her up.

Eve: "W-what are you doing!?".
"Picking you up".
Eve: "Thats not funny. Put me down!".
"No".
Eve: ".....".
"We dont know whats in the next room. It's easier this way".
She stops struggling and they enter the next room.

A music room. That was what this room looked like. Notes, instruments, and decorations filled the room. Keith carries Eve to the other side of the room and they try the door.

"Of course its locked".
Eve: "I wonder what the puzzle is for this room?".

They explore the room.....
11311122112111211111111111.title: Room 4

113111221121112111111111111.content:
Keith eventually puts her down as they try to solve this rooms puzzle.

Eve sees something. She goes over to one of the walls. "Is that a button?". She reaches up, even gets on the tips of her toes, but she just couldn't reach it.

Keith chuckles at the sight. "S-shut up!", she says, blushing.
"Sorry", he responds, walking up to her. He lifts her up and she presses the button.

The room comes to life. Songs from the various instruments fills the room. Then, in the exact center, giant piano keys appear on the floor and the music stops.
"That was weird".
Eve: "Yeah".

Eve kneels down and touches one of the giant floor keys. It makes a sound. "I see".
"You know what to do?".
Eve: "I think". She presses a few more keys. "Yeah. That song that played when I pressed that button. We have to recreate it using these".
"Oh. This is going to be fun".
113111221121112111111111111.title: Eve gets it.

1131112211211121111111111111.content:
2 hours later.

Eve: "Ok. I think I've got it for sure".
"You want me to try? You've been doing this for a long time now".
Eve: "No. I'm fine. And you don't know how to do it".

She backs up, gets a running start, and jumps onto one of the keys. As soon as she lands, she starts hopping from key to key as each note echoes through the room.

With one last leap, she clears a few keys and hits what she thinks is the last note in the song. She staggers off the giant note and Keith runs over to her.
Eve: "Damn this small body.....I'm exhausted.....D-did I get it?".
"I dont know".

The room suddenly comes to life once more. The song starts to play and the keys light up as the song plays. It ends and the room goes silent once more, followed by a loud unlocking sound.

"Uh....I think you got it.....".
1131112211211121111111111111.title: Room 4 solved.

11311122112111211111111111111.content:
She sits down, "thank god! I dont think I could of done that a 2nd time!".
"Yeah. Good job, really. There was no way I could of done that".
Eve: ".....C-come on. We should go to the next room". She starts to stand, but Keith scoops her back up. ".....".
"Lets go".

They approach the door.

Glowing red letters then appear on it.

LAST ROOM.

"We're almost done".
Eve: "Yes. That 10,000 will be ours!".

The door locks as they enter the final room.

A large circular stone room with stone pillars and a red glow that fills the room. But it was what was in the middle of the room that surprised them. A giant 12 foot monster was standing there, staring at them. With gray skin, black eyes, a loincloth, and all muscle, they just stood there.

Eve: ".....And now it all makes sense".
"What are you talking about?".
Eve: "All those other rooms.....They weren't just puzzles or traps".
"I dont get it".
Eve: "Then listen:

The first room wasn't just a puzzle. It was meant to tire us out".
"But you solved that one pretty fast".
Eve: "Yeah, and it was also the first room. Well, that and I am pretty smart.

The 2nd room. Full of pitfalls and other traps. It was meant to take as many of us out as possible, and it did that, it got Megan.

3rd room. A.....weird kind of trap. If you mess with one of the...."items"....in there, they make you younger, like it did me. I wont be of much help against that monster thanks to that room.

4th room. Was just like the first one, but harder. A puzzle that was very hard to solve and even if we did manage to figure it out, it would leave us tired.
All 4 rooms were meant to weaken us before we got to this room".

"And now we, or I have to beat that thing which is standing between us and 10,000 dollars".
Eve: "Thats right".

".....Then stay back. Here I go, I guess".
11311122112111211111111111111.title: They had a purpose.

113111221121112111111111111111.content:
He leaves Eve by the door they came in from. He walks past a pillar and stands in front of the monster. It growls, then roars at him. "Great. At least it doesn't have a weapon".

It raises one of it's hands and Keith barely moves out of the way as it smashes the ground, leaving a hole in the floor.

"You've got to be kidding. There's no way I can beat that thing! One hit and its over".

Eve was hiding behind one of the pillars, peering around it as she watched Keith run around and barely dodge it's attacks. (What is he suppose to do? Theres no way he can hurt it!)

She tries to think of something, but nothings coming to her. (Come on! There has to be some way! Something in this room that can be used against it!)

Forced against a pillar, it looks like Keith was going to lose. The monster's fist flys towards him, but he jumps to the side at the last second.

Relieved, Eve sighs, but then she notices something. The monster had pulled back his hand, and it looked like it was in pain. (Thats it!)

The monster had just missed Keith again and was about to try again when it suddenly straightened up. It tries to reach behind it, but its arms are too big.

A head then pops up from behind, it was Eve, and she had climbed up it's back. "What are you doing?". She then wraps something around the monster's face, blinding it. But she wasn't done, pulling out a rock she got from it punching that one pillar, she hits the top of it's head several times.

It starts to thrash and roar as she continues to beat it with the rock. She sees it's hands coming for her, and she jumps toward Keith. He catches her, "what were you thinking? All you did was make it mad! You could of been hurt!". He looks up and sees it rip whatever was on it off. "What did you use to-", he looks down at her and stops mid-sentence. Eve was naked. She had used the shirt, the only thing covering her, to temporarily blind it. They both blush.
Eve: "N-nows not the time for this! I know what I'm doing, head over there!".
"O-ok".

He runs in the direction that she is pointing, she has him stop, telling him to pick something up, she then has stand in front of a nearby pillar.

Eve: "Now throw those rocks at it!".
"What?!".
Eve: "Just do it!".

Keith starts chucking the rocks at him while Eve throws out insults.

The monster looses what little control it has. With a loud roar, it charges them. Keith was about to move, but Eve stops him. "Wait for it".

With the monster right on top of them, she yells, "now!", and Keith jumps and avoids the charging beast by a few inches. It slams through the pillar, and hits the wall on the opposite side. The dust settles and the remains of the pillar are scattered around the unconscious creature.

Eve: "W-we did it".
"Well, you did most of the work".

Suddenly, the room begins to shake.
"What now?".

The monster vanishes and the damaged pillars fix themselves.

The last door unlocks.
113111221121112111111111111111.title: How it ends.

1131112211211121111111111111111.content:
Keith puts her down and she takes a few steps forward, turning around, "well, lets go claim our prize!".
"Yeah. Lets.....".
Eve: "? Whats wrong?.....!". She suddenly screams, places her arms around her chest, and falls to the ground. She was still naked after all.

Keith removes his shirt and puts it on her. She thanks him, and they exit the last room.

And they find themselves back at the entrance.
"But we went through this door. How did we end up back here?".
Eve: "I dont know. Everything here is just weird".

AHEM!

Looking towards the front, they see the announcer and a crowd of people around him.

".....".
Eve: "How did we miss that?".

CONGRATULATIONS ON WINNING! YOU ARE THE FIRST ONES TO MAKE IT ALL THE WAY THROUGH! AND AS PROMISED, YOU HAVE WON THE GRAND PRIZE OF 10,000. IT WILL BE KEPT IN OUR PERSONAL BANK. WHENEVER YOU WISH TO ADD OR USE SOME OF YOUR MONEY, SIMPLY ASK ONE OF THE STAFF MEMBERS LOCATED THROUGHOUT THE CIRCUS. AND ONE LAST THING, YOUR LOST ITEMS ARE KEPT AT A REVIVAL STATION.

"A what?".
"IF ANYTHING HAPPENS TO YOU, SUCH AS YOU DIE, OR YOU LOSE AN ITEM OR ITS DESTROYED, YOU WILL FIND YOURSELF AND ALL YOU POSSESSIONS THERE".
Eve: "Well thats convenient".
"Ya think? We actually cant die while were here!".
Eve: "That kind of makes me want to take more risks".
"I know".

The crowd disperses.

Eve: "......! Wait, wheres Megan?".
1131112211211121111111111111111.title: Done with the contest.

11311122112111211111111111111112.content:
"I dont know. But shes not here".

The announcer overhears them. RIGHT, SHE LEFT. SHE THOUGHT IT WOULD TAKE A WHILE FOR YOU 2 TO EITHER LOSE OR MAKE IT THROUGH SO SHE DECIDED TO WALK AROUND.

Eve: "In this place? By herself?".

YES. SHE SHOULD BE BACK BY NOW, BUT CHANCES ARE, SOMETHING HAPPENED TO HER.

"Maybe we should go look for her.....
11311122112111211111111111111112.title: Megan took a walk.

113111221121112111111111111111121.content: Eve: "Yeah. Lets see if we can find her. She should be somewhere nearby".
113111221121112111111111111111121.title: Look for Megan.

choices: Head off on your own for a while.
113111221121112111111111111111122.content:
Eve: "I'm sure shes fine. This place is too big anyways. It'll be almost impossible to find her".
"Then are we going to wait for her?".
Eve: "Yeah. She'll eventually come back here. It shouldn't be too much longer".

They find somewhere nearby to sit and wait for her.

Keith notices that Eve is acting oddly. She looks tired. She keeps bobbing her head up and down, barely able to keep herself awake. He places a hand on her shoulder.

"Are you tired?".
Eve: "A little bit. Its this small body. I kinda over did it and now I can barely keep myself awake".
"At least it paid off. We won 10000 thanks to you".
Eve: ".....Yeah".

She yawns, then rubs one of her eyes.

"Alright. Come on. Lets go", he says, as he gets up and picks her up.
Eve: "W-where are we going?", she sleepily asks.
"You'll see, but I'm going to check on something first".

Keith heads back over to the announcer. "Hey. Is there someplace where we can stay or rent a room?".
AH. SHE NEEDS A NAP? FORTUNATELY FOR YOU, THERE IS. IN EVERY ONE OF THE TOWNS IN HERE, THERE IS AT LEAST 1 HOTEL. AND THESE HOTELS ARE FREE. JUST SIMPLY ASK FOR A ROOM. ITS THAT TALL BUILDING THERE.
"Thanks.....Oh! Could you do 1 more thing for me? If Megan comes back, could you tell her where we are?".
SURE. I'LL TELL HER IF SHE COMES BY.

He starts walking towards the big building when he sees that Eve had fallen asleep. "Heh, Guess she was tired". At the hotel, he walks up to the counter. "Uh, I would like a room?".
"Sure", the employee hands him a key card. "Enjoy your stay". He takes his leave, but not before telling him about Megan.

Taking the elevator up to his floor, he finds his room. "This is a nice room".

There is only 1 large bed. He pulls back the covers and gently places her down. He pulls the covers over her. "I hope you enjoy your nap".

He sits in one of the chairs and turns on the TV. "What should I do? Should I wait here? Well, I could look around on my own for a while.....".
113111221121112111111111111111122.title: She'll be fine.

1131112211211121111111111111111221.content: "I'm a little tired myself. I think I'll just wait here and relax. Maybe Megan will show up".
1131112211211121111111111111111221.title: Stay with her.

1131112211211121111111111111111222.content:
"I think I'll take a quick look around".

He takes his shirt back and after leaving her a note, he exits their room and the hotel, then starts to look around.....
1131112211211121111111111111111222.title: On his own.

11311122112111211111111111111112221.content:
Not sure of what to do, he picks a random direction and walks away from the hotel.

Then he remembers what the announcer had told them.

"A revival station, huh? Then does that meant that her clothes would be there? Maybe I'll go take a quick look.....".

He finds a sign pointing towards the towns revival station and follows it.

Finding it, he enters and is greeted by a girl.

"Welcome to Revival Station C of the Main Grounds, how can I help you?".

"Yeah, I was told that I could retrieve "lost" items here. My friend lost her clothes and her shirt was torn up.....".
"I see, and what is her name?".
"Evelyn".
"Just a sec.........Ah! Here she is, yes, her clothes have been recovered and repaired". The girl does something on a computer, then goes over to a strange machine. Lights, a flash, then Eve's clothes are sitting there. She takes them and puts them in a bag, "here you go, is there anything else I can help you with?".

He thinks for a second, ".....Oh! Yes, yes there is. These clothes wont fit her right now, do you know where I can get something that will fit her?".
"Her size changed, huh? Then I have the perfect little shop for you......".

She gives him directions to it, does he go?
11311122112111211111111111111112221.title: Retrieving lost items.

113111221121112111111111111111122211.content:
"This must be it", he says, finding the shop that the girl had told him about. "LISA'S CLOTHES, simple name, well, I hope this place has something for Eve, I can definitely afford it.....".

The shop has 2 floors, and it is filled with clothes of all types and sizes.

"Can I help you find something?", someone says. Keith looks towards the voice and sees a girl with brown hair and brown eyes.
"I'm looking for something for my friend to wear".
"And what happened to her?".
"Huh, oh, she was turned into a kid.....".
"I see, a little age regression.....please, follow me".

She leads him to a section with clothes for little girls. "Could you tell me a little more about what happened? It'll help me find something for you".
"Ok", he tells her what happened.

The girl picks out a purple and black one piece dress with black gloves, black shoes, and white panties, "from your description of her, I think these will look good on her".

"Alright, how much?".
"How much? Then your new.....Dont worry about the price, just take it".
"What? Really? I CAN afford it".
"Let me tell you something, the shops in the circus dont usually ask for money for their goods. It goes against what this place is meant for. We only tend to ask for a small amount of money for the stuff thats harder to make or come across, usually. So dont worry about some clothes, take them".
"Huh, well, thanks for your help".
"Dont mention it, but, before you go, would you mind helping me? Maybe help me with some of my products?".
113111221121112111111111111111122211.title: The little clothing shop.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111.content:
"Maybe later, I should get back to her, cant leave her naked".
"Alright, come back soon!".

On his way back to the hotel, something catches his eye, he stops and looks at it, then continues towards the hotel.....
1131112211211121111111111111111222111.title: Maybe later. Back to Eve.

11311122112111211111111111111112221111.content:
In the hotel, up the elevator, into his room.

Eve is till sleeping. He puts the bag of clothes next to the bed and sits in a chair. He turns on the TV and opens up a book he picked up while in town. "This should help, a book about this place, this place is.....different.....this will help a lot".

.....

After marking down several things that interest him, Eve wakes up. She sits up, and looks around, "huh? How did I get here?". She sees Keith, but he is looking away from her.
"Uh, Eve.....your clothes are in the bag over there".
"My clothes?.....!". She quickly covers herself with the blanket and then takes the bag. As she looks through it, Keith tells her what happened since she fell asleep.

She thanks him and puts on the clothes that will fit her current size. Sitting on the bed, Keith gets up and sits next to her. He shows her the book on the place, "I think I found some great places for us to check out, though, we're still missing Megan.....".
11311122112111211111111111111112221111.title: Back to Eve.

113111221121112111111111111111122211111.content:
A knock on the door. "Who could that be?", Keith says. He gets up and goes to the door and opens it.

".....Megan?!".
"Keith! You really are here!", she says, then tackles him, "oh, it's been so long! I didn't think I'd be able to find you!".

She walks into the room and sees a small girl on the bed. "Huh? Whos the little girl?".
Eve: ".....little girl.....".
Then it hits her, ".....! Ah! Eve? Is that you?".
Eve: "Yeah, its me.....".
Megan runs over to her and starts to "examine" her, "how did this happen? Your so cute!".
Eve: "W-what are you doing? Stop that! N-not there!".
While she was playing with Eve, Keith tells her what happened.

Megan: "So thats how she ended up like this", she stops, satisfied, and looks at him, "so what do we do now? This place is really amazing, I cant wait! Lets go do something!".
Eve: ".....But.....what took you so long to get here? He asked the guy at the contest to tell you where we went, did something happen to you?".
Megan: ".....".
Eve: "Something DID happen, what? Tell me!".
Megan: ".....A plant.....".
"A plant?".
Megan: "I-I was eaten by a plant.....".
Keith&Eve: "Huh?".
Megan: "After I was taken out, I went for a walk outside of town.....I saw a pretty plant off the trail and went to look at it.....The next thing I knew, the thing had its vines around me.....and then it.....ate me...........I woke up a few hours later and tried to find both of you".
Eve starts laughing.
"Alright, I think we've heard enough, lets get out of here you 2".

They take the bag and leave the hotel.

What happens next?
113111221121112111111111111111122211111.title: Megan?

choices: There is a place I want to go.
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
Megan: So what are we going to do? Are we going to go to some of the places in that book you got?".

"Yes, I think we should.....
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: The book is the guide.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
"Go over there, there is a place I want to check out".

Megan&Eve: Ok.

Using the book as a guide, they pass many buildings, booths, events, rides, and so much more until they reach their destination. The building, compared to everything else that they have encountered and seen, was normal looking. A rectangle shaped building with a door and a few windows, nothing to make it stand out.

Megan: What is this place?
Eve: Yeah, where did you bring us?
"You'll see once we get inside".

They walk inside.

And just like the outside, the inside seems normal. A few seats are by the door and a counter is on the other side of the room.

Megan: Why did you bring us to a uh.....wherever we are.....
Eve: This place looks like a waiting room. But what does this place do?

Keith doesn't answer, instead, he walks up to the counter and is greeted by the attendant, "hello, how can I help you?".
"Yes, I read this book and found out about this place, is it true?".
Attendant: Yes, it is.
With puzzled looks from Eve and Megan, Keith continues, "then I would like to buy a house here".
Eve&Megan: !!!!!What!?
Attendant: Alright, then take this pamphlet, it explains the type, the places you can put it, and what you can put into it.

He steps back from the counter and Eve and Megan are upon him in a flash.
Eve: Buy a house? Are you serious!?
Megan: Can we even do that here?
"Yes, we can. Here, read this", he says, while handing them the book.

Megan and Eve read the excerpt from the book.

IT IS POSSIBLE TO STAY IN THE CIRCUS. THIS IS DONE BY PURCHASING A HOUSE FROM 1 OF THE PLACES LISTED BELOW. BUT I MUST INFORM YOU THAT DOING THIS, UNLIKE SO MANY OTHER THINGS HERE, WILL COST QUITE A BIT OF MONEY. HOWEVER, BY BUYING A PLACE TO LIVE HERE, YOU WILL NEVER HAVE TO LEAVE. DUPLICATES WILL BE MADE OF YOU, JUST LIKE IF YOU DECIDE TO STAY LONGER THAN PLANNED, AND THE DUPLICATES WILL TAKE OVER YOUR LIVES UNTIL YOU WISH TO GO BACK. BY DOING THIS, YOU CAN ENJOY THE MANY WONDERS AND EXCITEMENTS OF THE CIRCUS MORE FREELY THAN YOU COULD EVER HOPE TO DO SO BY COMMUTING HERE FROM OUTSIDE OUR WALLS.

Megan and Eve just stare at the page, reading it over and over again.

Megan: Really? W-we can stay! We never have to leave!?
Eve: This is amazing", she looks at Keith, "are we really going to do this?
He smiles at them, "yes, our winning that contest should cover the cost of a house".
Eve: Hopefully, let me see the pamphlet he gave you". She flips through it. "It may cost a lot, but its still nothing compared to the price of houses outside the circuis".
"I know".
Megan: Really?
Eve: Yes, according to this, we can afford the best kind of house here, a mansion.
Megan:.....We're going to live in a mansion!?
"Yes we are".
Eve: Then all we have to do now is pick where to put it and what goes in it.
"Yup".
Megan: Then what are we waiting for! Lets get started!

After several hours of picking and choosing, they are ready to purchase their house.

They walk up to the attendant and tell him what they want, where it goes, and what goes in it.

Attendant: ......and it is done. Thank you for purchasing a house, we hope you enjoy it.

The attendant gives them directions to their new home and they start off towards it and their new lives.
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: A new start.

choices: Go back to town/the main grounds.
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
They exit the main grounds and head to their new home, which is just a short walk away.

They stop in the middle of the road and look at a smaller road thats branching off the side and heads deeper into the surrounding forest. A sign is next to it.

THIS WAY TO THE HOME OF KEITH, EVELYN, AND MEGAN.

".....I guess its this way.....".
Evelyn: Yeah.....
Megan: This is so AWESOME! I can't believe it!
Evelyn: I've got to say, they do work fast, we first came here on this road and that road wasn't there before.
"Well, I would be surprised, but from what we've seen.....let's just go".

Down the smaller road that leads to their house, with trees on all sides, they finally reach the end of the road and enter a large clearing with a large mansion in the distance.

The 3 of them just stare at it, mouths open.
Megan breaks the silence.
Megan: OH MY GOD! IS THAT IT! I-I CANT BELIEVE THIS IS REALLY HAPPENING!

Unable to contain herself any longer, she dashes towards it, turns around, and says, "what are you 2 doing? Lets go!".
Keith and Eve snap out of it and start walking towards their mansion.
Evelyn: I am so glad you won those tickets Keith.
"So am I, heh, look at her, I can't remember the last time I've seen her so excited".
Evelyn: I know.....I really can't get over this......like she said, I cant believe this is really happening.
"Yeah, and we have you to thank for this".
Evelyn blushes, "w-what? Y-yeah.....I guess.....

They reach the house.

The house itself is massive. With a road that goes all the way from the main road and circles a large lake in front of the house to the front door, it has 3 floors and is by far 1 of the biggest buildings that they have ever seen.

Keith opens 1 side of the large front door, "after you". They enter the building and are again, stunned by what they see.

A large open space with many fancy decorations, 2 sets of stairs on both sides of the room that head up to the 2 other floors and several doors and rooms on all 3.

Megan: W-where do we even begin?
Evelyn:.....We should probably pick our rooms.
Megan: Oh, right, of course.

Up to the 2nd floor, to the right and left are 2 massive halls with many doors.

3rd floor, same thing, 2 hallways so long that they can't even see the end and the sides are adorned with rooms.

Keith looks back down the stairs and looks at Megan and Eve, I think I'll take this 1, he says, opening the door to the room in the very center of the 3rd floor, "yeah, this 1 is a normal room, though some of these things look pretty expensive".

Megan: then I'll take this 1", she says, taking the room to the left.
Evelyn: and that makes this 1 mine", saying as she walks to the room on his right.

After finding the kitchen, they have dinner and plan what they will do with the rest of the day.

Evelyn: it is getting pretty late, what should we do? We now have an infinite amount of time to explore this circus. Should we wait till tomorrow and look around this place? Or we could go back into town for a little while.
"I'm up for whatever, you 2 decide".
Megan: well.....I want to......
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: The mansion.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
Megan: stay here. We just bought a house! I want to look around!
"Alright".
Eve: Same here.

They split up and start to individually search the 3 floor mansion and the area surrounding it.

Over an hour later and they meet back up. In all, the find: 8 bathrooms, a lab, a library, 6 supply closets, a kitchen, 2 living rooms, 2 game rooms, 1 indoor and 1 outdoor pool, a shed with sport equipment, several fields to use them on, and a whole lot more.

Megan: I'm so excited! I never through that I would ever be able to live in a place like this!
"I feel the exact same way".
Eve: Of course I do as well. We got so much for so little, this "Circus", really is amazing. I.....*yawn*.

Megan gets an evil smile an her face, "ahhh, is the little girl tired?".
Eve gives her an angry stare.
"Oh, thats right, you're still small, aren't you. I'm surprised it hasn't worn off yet".
Eve: I know, I hope it doesn't last much longer".
"But, you know what, I'm actually getting use to you like that".
Megan: Me too.
Eve:.....great.....

It was pretty late now, after midnight. Deciding to call it a night, they go to the 3rd floor, enter their rooms, and go to sleep.....
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: Their 1st day finally ends.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
Keith wakes up and heads for the closest bathroom. A quick shower, and he quietly makes his way downstairs.

Back down on the 1st floor, he hears a door open. Looking back upstairs, he sees the tiny Eve walk out of her room. Rubbing her eyes, she looks down at him.

Eve: Where are you going?
"I was going to go get a few supplies. They did give us a stocked pantry, but we do only have the clothes we have on".

Eve looks down at the purple/black dress that Keith had gotten her the previous day, "yeah, I shouldn't wear this thing 2 days in a row".

"Do you want to come with me? I was going to go to where I got you those clothes first".
Eve:.....Do I?
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: Something to wear.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content: Does he go with just Eve, or does Megan go too?
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: Going together.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
They ask Megan, but its too early for her.

Megan: What? No, I want to sleep.....
Eve: Ok, we'll be back in a bit.
Megan:....Oh! Get me some clothes too.
Eve: Alright.

Eve leaves Megan's room and heads back down to Keith on the 1st floor.

Eve: She doesn't want to come.
"But she still wants us to get her something, right?"
Eve: Of course.
"*Sigh*, let's go.

They leave and head back down the road that leads to the main road. Eve looks back at their new home as they enter the forest.....
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: Back they go.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
Through the forest, back onto the main road, and inside the main grounds.

Eve: So where is this clothes shop?
"Hmmm, I think it's over there".
Eve: You think?
"Yeah, I don't remember exactly, but it is by the hotel where we stayed at yesterday".

Heading back in the direction of the hotel, Keith remembers where it is.

"This place looks familiar.....! There it is, over there".
Eve: LISA'S CLOTHES. Well, lets go in.

Upon entering the store, they are greeted by the same person as yesterday.

Lisa:Hello, how can I help.....Oh, it's you, from yesterday". The girl looks down at Eve and recognizes her clothes. "And this must be the friend you told me about".
Eve introduces herself.
Lisa: I'm glad that the clothes fit her, so, then, what can I help you with today?
Keith tells her about them buying a house.
Lisa: I see, then you will need a lot of clothes for you, her, and your other friend then.
"Yes, that's right".
Lisa: Ok, then please tell me about her while we look for something for you 2.
Eve: I was also wondering if I could get something for myself when I'm back to normal.
Lisa: Of course.

They spend over an hour in the store.

Lisa: And that's everything. Oh, and before you go, that offer I gave you the last time you were here, I could still use your help with it.
Eve: Offer? What offer is she talking about Keith?
"Oh, when I got you those clothes yesterday, she asked if I would like to help her with some of her products. I had to get back to you, so I didn't help her last time. We could now, since we now have all the time in the world".
Eve: Let me think about it......
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: Lisa's clothes, again.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
Eve: That does sound like fun, I do like this store of yours, but I haven't even taken a shower yet, and I have to get these clothes back to Megan.....Can I help you some other time?
Lisa: Of course, I like you 2. Come by anytime.
Eve: Alright, We will, let's go Keith.
"Ok".
They leave Lisa's store and head back home;however, what they don't see is the smirk that Lisa gives them as they exit her store.....

Back at the mansion.

Keith and Eve head up to the 3rd floor. Eve checks on Megan.

Eve: She is still asleep.....
"Figures".
Eve: I'll wake her up and giver her her clothes.
"Ok, here you go", Keith says, handing Eve the bags with their clothes in them.

Keith takes his clothes into his room as Eve enters Megans'.

Eve: Ok, time to wake up Megan.

She doesn't move.

Eve opens the blinds, letting the sunlight in.

She doesn't move.

Eve throws the bags onto Megan.

She doesn't move.

Eve: ......I forgot how hard it is to wake her up.....Though I know how.....

Eve leaves and comes back with a bucket of water and throws it on Megan.

This wakes her up.

Megan: Ahhh! Wha-what the!?.....Eve? Why did you do that?
Eve: You wouldn't wake up, again.
Megan: You know I hate it when you do that!
Eve: And you know its the only way to get you up!

Megan notices the bag.

Megan: Oh, you already went?
Eve: It's been over 2 hours since we left!
Megan: Oh", she says, rummaging through the bags.

The 2 of them remove all the clothes and lay them on Megan's bed, though they notice something.....odd.

Megan:.....Aren't there more clothes of yours than there should be?
Eve:......Yeah, and I don't remember us getting 1/2 of them.
Megan picks up a small orange shirt. "did she pick out more for you herslef?".
Eve: I guess, but, doesn't it look like there are 2 sets? Almost like 1/2 of these clothes are for someone else.
Megan: Now that you mention it....yeah, it does.....weird.....
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: Back home.

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
Megan picks up a pair of yellow socks that are far too small for her.

Megan: Yellow socks? I don't think they suit you.
Eve: The only thing I can think of is that she put them in by mistake.

Megan takes 1 of the yellow socks and lifts her leg.

Eve: What are you doing?
Megan: I want to see how far up my leg it can go. It might be one of those types of stretching socks.
Eve: It won't make it far, and it doesn't look like it is.....
Megan: Well lets just see.

As soon as her foot touches the inside of the sock, she gets a weird sensation.

Megan: Ah! What was that? Did it shock me?

Shrugging it off, she continues to put it on, and, to her surprise, it slides around her foot and up her leg.

Megan: Whoa! If fits! Is it 1 of those 1 size fits all things?
Not getting an answer, she looks at Eve and sees her staring at her, a look of shock and surprise on her face.
Megan: Eve? Whats wrong?
Eve: Y-you, how?
Megan starts to panic,"whats wrong? What happened!?".
Eve points at a mirror and Megan looks at it.

She screams.

Of course Keith hears this and runs next door.

"W-what happend?! Why did.....you......".

There, was Eve, and right next to her was another little girl, but with light brown hair and brown eyes. The girl looks at him.

".....Megan?! W-what happened to you?".
With tears in her eyes, she runs over to him wraps her tiny arms around him as he kneels down,"I-I don't know! Why am I small too?".
Keith places a hand on her head, "It's alright, It's alright. Your a kid again, just like Eve, I'm sure that it's only temporary".
Megan: Uh-huh.
Keith looks at Eve, "maybe we can figure this out. Tell me, what did she do?".
Eve: Oh, yeah, let me think, after I woke her up the usual way, we started going through the clothes.....!!!!!!
"Did you figure something out?"
Eve: I-I think", she walks over to the bed and picks up the other yellow sock, the first 1 still on Megan's leg.".....Of course, It's the sock".
"The sock?".

Eve tells him about the extra clothes they got.

Eve: ......And as she started to put it on, she started to regress".
"So the clothes we got from Lisa made her a kid again.....wait.....no.....
Eve: What?
"If she gave us clothes that made her younger.....then.....no....".
Eve: What!?
He looks at her, "what if, the clothes that you're wearing, are why you haven't changed back yet?".
Eve: !!!!! Of course!
Megan: B-but why would she do that to us?
Eve: Because she can. Think about what kind of place this is. I don't think she meant anything bad by it. She was just pranking us.
Megan: Then how do we change back?
Eve: We probably just take these off.
Megan looks down at the sock and realizes that she is only wearing, besides the 1 sock, a too large shirt. She blushes, but then bends over to take it off.
Eve: Wait.
Megan: What?
Eve: Lets go take a bath before we take em off.
Megan: ?????Ok.....

They take a change of clothes and head for the nearest bathroom, leaving Keith behind.

Does taking them off work?
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: Not Megan too!

1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.content:
In a bathroom, Eve takes off her clothes as Megan removes the 1 sock and too big shirt.

They look at each other, thinking that they'll shoot up to their normal height.....yet.....nothing happens.....

Eve: Ok, lets not panic. Maybe it takes a while for it to wear off.
Megan: Y-yeah, that has to be it.
Eve: Let's just take our shower or bath. Let's give it a little time.

Almost an hour later and they still haven't changed back. They have already gotten out and dried off, but are reluctant to put on the clothes that would fit them, knowing that they probably would keep them as children.

Keith knocks at the door, "are you 2 ok in there?".

Eve:Y-yeah.
".....Ok then.....", he says, leaving after.

They wait another 1/2 hour and still nothing.

Megan: I-is it really going to wear off?
Eve: I'm not too sure now.....The only thing I can think of is to go and ask Lisa herself.
Eve puts on another 1 of the small sets of clothes from the store.
Megan: What are you doing?!
Eve: We don't know how long, if it even will, wear off. So I'm going to go ask her.
Megan agrees and puts on 1 of her small sets of clothes and they exit the bathroom.

They look for Keith and find him in 1 of the game rooms.

He is on a couch, watching a large screen TV. He hears them and turns around, getting a surprise to see them still small.

"You're still kids? Did it not work?".
Eve: No, it didnt. We even gave it a little time, nothing.
"What are you going to do now?".
Eve: I want to talk to Lisa.
"I see......But thats going to have to wait......".
Eve: Why?

Keith points towards the closest window. While they were in the bathroom, a large thunderstorm had started and was raging outside.

Megan&Eve just stare out the window.

".....Until it passes, we're kinda stuck.....".

The 2 of them, thinking that they were going to find a way to change back, depressingly look out the window. Keith walks over to them, kneels, and places a hand on both of their heads. They turn around and look at him.

"Its not like we're going to be stuck inside forever. The storm will pass, and I promise, the second it does, the 3 of us will pay Lisa a visit and fix the 2 of you".
They smile at him, and Megan asks, "what are we going to do to pass the time?".
"Well......we ARE in a game room.....there are movies, video games, ping pong, air hockey, and a lot of other things here we can do".
Eve: Alright, lets have some fun while were waiting.
Megan: Yes!

Keith gets up and steps away from them.....

Eve: Keith.
He turns around.
Megan&Eve: Thanks.
".....Y-Yeah.....".

Hours pass as they play games, watch movies, and the 2 age regressed girls team up against him in ping pong and a few other games.

The storm still hasn't passed.

They decide to check the forecast on the TV.

Eve: Great.....its suppose to last all day.....
Megan: And its getting late.
"It doesn't look like we'll be able to go today".
Megan and Eve are depressed again.
"Look, you 2, we live here now, so we couldn't make into town today, we'll go tomorrow".
Eve: Alright
Megan: I guess.

They play for a few more hours, make dinner, and then head back to 1 of the 2 game rooms for a little longer, all the while the storm raged outside.

The storm finally ends, but its too late to go now. With no choice but to go tomorrow, they head for their rooms for the night.

Keith enters his room and Eve&Megan begin talking.

In his room, Keith slips on his new pair of pajamas and gets into bed. His door opens and Megan and Eve walk in, in their pajamas as well.

"Do you 2 need something?".
They look at each other, then back at him.
Megan: W-we want to sleep with you.....
"What!?".
Megan: W-we can't?
"......N-no, I didn't mean it like that.....but.....you 2 Eve?".
Eve: .....y-yes....", she shyly says, looking away from him.
".....I-I guess it's alright.....".

Megan walks over to 1 side of the bed and crawls in while Eve slowly shuffles her way to the other side and stops, looking away and blushing. She eventually gets in and lays down, facing away from Keith. Megan; however, use to her tackling Keith, uses his shoulder as a pillow while laying herself against him and making herself comfortable. She looks over at Eve, and then whispers something to Keith.

(Really?)
Megan: (Yes! Do it! She'll like it. She's just being shy!)
(Ok.....).

Removing his arm from under Megan's head and around her body, he leans over and wraps his arms around Eve.

Shocked, and blushing, "W-what are you doing?".
"Megan said to do this and that you'll like it".
At her size, her struggles are in vain as he flips her over and lays her against him, just as Megan was. Eve looks over at Megan, who was smiling at her as he puts an arm around her and lays her head against his shoulder. He puts his other arm back under and over Megan as he gets himself comfortable.

Megan: You like this, don't you?
Eve: .....I.....um......
Megan: What? Are you going to move?
Eve: ......n-no......
Megan: See? You do like it!
"Stop teasing her Megan".
Megan: Alright.
"Goodnight you 2".
Megan: Goodnight.
Eve: G-goodnight.....
1131112211211121111111111111111222111111.title: No, it doesn't and another day passes.

1131112211211121111111111111111222112.content: Well, there are a LOT of clothes, and most of them are free, what harm could it do to put on one or to help the girl?
1131112211211121111111111111111222112.title: What harm could it do?

11311122112111212.content:
Much to Megan's dismay, they decide to split up.

"Hopefully this will increase our chances of winning".
Eve: "Yes. Each one of these rooms has some kind of test in it, by spitting up, we take different tests and just maybe one of us will get through and get the 10,000".
"So all thats left is for us to pick a door".

Each picking one,

Megan: "I hope nothing too scary happens".
Eve: "I can already see what I'm going to spend that money on".
"Hopefully we all make it, see you 2 at the exit".

They wish each other good luck and enter their first room of the Haunted House Challenge.
11311122112111212.title: Splitting up.

113111221121112121.content: Keith takes the door of his choice.
113111221121112121.title: Go with Keith.

113111221121112122.content:
Megan, who hates scary things.

Eve, who enjoys a good scare.
113111221121112122.title: Go with Megan/Eve.

1131112211211121221.content: Megan takes the door of her choice.
1131112211211121221.title: Megan.

1131112211211121222.content: Eve takes the door of her choice.
1131112211211121222.title: Eve.

113111221121121.content:
Megan: "What about that one? It looks like it'll be fun!", she says, pointing towards an attraction.

WELCOME TO THE HAUNTED MAZE! CAN YOU MAKE IT TO THE END? A PRIZE IS GIVEN TO THE FEW WHO ESCAPE THE TRAPS SET THROUGHOUT THIS ATTRACTION!

Eve: "Hmmm....A prize, huh? Interesting.....I think we should give it a shot".
"Alright, I feel the same, what about you, Megan?".
Megan: "Yes! Lets do it!".

They walk up to the announcer. AND WE HAVE 3 MORE WHO WILL ATTEMPT TO REACH THE END OF THE MAZE. WILL THEY BE SOME OF THE FEW THAT HAVE MANAGED TO MAKE IT TO THE FAR SIDE? OR WILL THEY FAIL, LIKE SO MANY BEFORE THEM?

They decide to go as a group and open the door into the maze.....
113111221121121.title: The haunted maze.

1131112211211211.content:
I HAVE A LITTLE BIT OF ADVICE TO GIVE YOU 3, WATCH WHERE YOU STEP AND WATCH WHAT YOU TOUCH. THAT IS HOW YOU WILL BE TAKEN OUT, NOTHING CAN COME AT YOU ON ITS OWN, IT MUST BE TRIGGERED. OH, AND GOOD LUCK!

They close the door and take a few steps, then something behind them starts to glow. They turn around just in time to see the door vanish.

Eve: ".....I guess we have no choice but to play now.....".
"Yeah.....So we need to be careful, we can do this".

In what seems like a long hallway, everything is pitch black, except for the lights that turn on as they pass and then shut off when they are far enough away.

Eve: "We should be fine, as long as we dont touch anything and watch where we step".
Megan: ".....Eve.....your taking this too seriously! We get it, we're going to be...." *click* ".....careful.....".

They look down and see that Megan had stepped on a switch, triggering one of the traps.

Keith&Eve: ".....Megan.....".
Megan: ".....oops.....".
1131112211211211.title: That was fast.....

11311122112112111.content:
They hear a click, then an explosion beneath Eve. Keith and Megan back up as smoke fills the hall.

The smoke clears, and Eve is standing there, she seems to be alright....

Megan runs over to her and puts her hands on Eve, "are you ok?".
Eve: "I-I think so".
Megan: "I'm so sorry! I should of been more careful!".
Eve: "Its alright, nothing seems to have happened".
Megan: ".....".
"Yeah, she seems alright, so lets keep going".
Eve & Megan: "Yeah/alright".

Megan takes her hands off of Eve, or, she tries to. "What? Let go!".
Eve: "I'm not doing anything!".
Megan pulls and her hands pop off, and she falls on her ass. "Ow! Why did.....you.....", she had looked at her hands, and to her surprise/horror, part of Eve was on them. She looks at where she had placed her hands and she could see hand prints in Eve's skin. She screams.

Eve's body starts to change. The gaps in her skin from Megan's hands starts to spread. Her body starts to change to a light blue, "whats happening to me?", she says, as her clothing is absorbed into her body.

Megan, who is still on the ground, stares at her, but Keith walks up to her and pokes her. His finger sinks into her, and has a little trouble pulling it out of her.

"I-I think your made of slime now.....".
Eve: "What?".
"Yeah, I think that explosion turned you into a slime girl.....".

Before anything else could be said, one of the walls near her begins to vibrate as they hear another clicking sound. A section of the wall then propels forward and smashes Eve against the opposite side.

Megan screams as goo drips out from the sides of the wall sections.
11311122112112111.title: Smash!

113111221121121111.content:
Megan finally gets to her feet and starts to run over to the goo, but Keith grabs her. "Let me go! I have to get to her!".
"Wait! I dont think its over! Its not safe!".
