Now standing there, naked, and in the middle of this odd room, she waits for Heather to starts whatever it is she has planned.
154121111111111111111112122222121.title: The dirt room.

1541211111111111111111121222221211.content:
A beam of white light appears by the right wall, and a tall normal looking tree appears in the room. "Please approach the tree Sarah", she hears Heather say over a loudspeaker.

Sarah cautiously approaches it. With the tree right in front of her, she waits for something to happen.

She then hears Heather's voice over the loudspeaker. "That plant is a hybrid apple tree, it was created to make high quality apples from easy to require materials, in other words, from humans". But before she could complain, the tree attacks. A large root pops out of the ground and the tip engulfs her head. Heather and Melissa can hear muffled screams coming from inside as Sarah tries to escape it's clutches.

She grabs the sides of the root and pulls with all her strength, but it's no use, the tree continues to pull her in.

She continues to get taken in by the tree, now with only her ass and below out of the expanding root, it doesn't even take 10 seconds for her entire body to be swallowed up. The root doesn't disappear back underground, it stays at the surface, with the obvious bulge of Sarah struggling inside.

Looking in from outside, they watch as her struggles begin to slow down. "What's going on?", Melissa asks. Heather turns to her and responds, "it's starting to absorb her".

They watch as her struggles lessen as the bulge in the root starts to shrink. The root finally returns back to it's normal size, having finally finished with Sarah. It then goes back underground.

"We just have to wait a few minutes for the final part".

It was scary, at first, the plant had completely devoured her and she was screaming and thrashing out of both shock and horror. But, the longer she spent in there, the better it felt. She eventually stopped struggling and let the tree do whatever it was doing to her, then, darkness.

She couldn't see anything, but she could feel herself moving. She felt herself go down, then up, then she was sitting in one place for a while. This was short lived, she felt herself thrust forward at tremendous speed, and then their was light, she could see, and hear. She was still in the same room, and could see Melissa and Heather through the window, but she couldn't speak or move. "What is going on?".

They see a bulge moving on one of the branches. It emerges from the tree, travels across the branch and once it hits the tip, it stops. Something red starts to emerge from it, and a shiny red apple is now dangling from the branch of the tree.

"It's safe to go in now. I made sure it won't attack us". They enter the chamber and walk up to the tree. Reaching up, Heather plucks the apple and examines it. "Success. It worked perfectly". She then handed the apple to Melissa. "That apple there is your friend, you can have her. Now if you would so kindly leave. I have a ton of data to go over now".

Melissa leaves the store and finds an empty table outside. Placing the Sarah apple in front of her, "first a cake and now an apple! Lucky you, I want to try something like that. Whatever, I eventually will", she picks the apple up. "But what to do with you? You do look tasty".
1541211111111111111111121222221211.title: Apple.

15412111111111111111111212222212111.content:
"I'll just eat you now. Then it's my turn to be transformed!".

Picking her up by her stem, she is staring into Melissa's smiling face. She watches as Melissa likes her lips, then sees her open mouth coming at her.

Melissa takes a big bite, chews and swallows. "Wow, again, the best. Sarah, you truly are tasty". She takes bite after bite, eating as much of her as she can.

With barely anything left, "that should be enough for her to revive", and she tosses the core into a nearby trashcan.

A familiar feeling overtakes her body as Melissa begins to digest her once again. She is liquefied, and taken into her hot depths. She is almost immediately absorbed, and what's left of her compacts and hardens the the lowest part of her. Sarah suddenly sees light, followed by a cold wet feeling. She sees Sarah smile and wave as she starts to spin, then she blacks out.

Waking up, she looks around and sees.........
15412111111111111111111212222212111.title: In one way and out the other.

154121111111111111111112122222121112.content:
She see that she is in a bed, but it doesn't look like one of the revival stations that she's been it. Feeling another weight on her, she looks down and sees Melissa, asleep and holding her. Melissa eyes slowly open, "mmhhhn? Your awake?", she sits up and stretches. "I'll make it quick. After I ate you, I went to the closest revival clinic and asked them to let you revive here, at my house". I guess i was a little tired, cause when I got back and saw you, I took a quick nap as well". She leans over and embraces her, "you were great, again. So sweet". She let's go, "but, it's my turn now. I really want to give the hole being transformed and eaten thing".

The 2 of them get up, get dressed, and head back to town.
154121111111111111111112122222121112.title: Back to Melissa's house.

1541211111121.content:
But there was something else that she had missed. Not only did these strange glowing plants shrink her, they had given her wings.

2 long pure white transparent wings were now on her back. "Wha-what the hell!? How did these get there?".

At first, she tried to pull them off, thinking that they weren't connected. But the slight, sharp pain she got from pulling forced her to realize that they were attached to her. With the only light source, the plants, she tries to figure what she would do next.

Knowing that her new size has made her pretty much vulnerable to just about anything, she gets an idea. She does have wings now, maybe she can fly?

Focusing, they twitch. Several minutes later, she can control them. And some time after that, she is hovering off of the ground.

"This is amazing! I can fly! Time to get out of here".

With her new size, she is forced to leave everything she brought on the forest path as she flies straight up, completely naked.
1541211111121.title: Not just small....

15412111111211.content:
Clearing the tree tops, she keeps going straight up, higher and higher into the sky she goes. She stops, looking down, she can see the entire circus.

All the clearings, small towns, buildings, rides, all sorts of things in the enclosed circus.

"Unbelievable, I cant believe that I can fly. I can see everything from up here. But where should I go?".
15412111111211.title: Where to go....

choices: Nope, still small and with wings.
154121111112111.content:
Sarah spots a small river, one of many. "That's a good place to start", saying to herself, diving straight towards it.

Arriving at the river, she begins to explore. She skims along the water, goes up to the various plants, and just has an amazing time as hours pass.

It is now late, the sun has begun to set. She can hear the crickets and various other animals begin to come out.

"Its pretty late now, guess I lost track of time. I need to find a place to spend the night, and soon. Probably shouldn't be out when everything else is, especially at this size".

Remembering that there was what looked like a small town near the river. Starting to head towards it, and what she was leaving to prevent, happened.

Something long and slimy suddenly wrapped around her waist. Grabbing it and trying to remove it, she turns around and sees a giant frog. It's long tongue was what wrapped around her.

Seeing this, her struggling increases, but it was futile. The tongue was just too strong. It pulls in it's tongue, and she was in it's mouth in a few seconds. Now partially sticking out, she tries and tries to free herself as the frog continues to pull her all the way in.

It closes it's mouth, trapping her in a fleshy, moist prison. She is covered in saliva followed by it sending her to it's stomach. Sarah was forced into a ball shaped as it's digestive juices quickly dissolved her and send her liquefied body deeper into itself. As she blacks out, "Why? It was such a great day..... I don't want to be this.....things.....food....", was the last thing that went through her mind before everything went dark.

Waking up, and surprised to be alive, she finds herself in a bed in a small room. Looking around, she sees that.....
154121111112111.title: River capture.

1541211111121112.content:
"Great... What is going on? How can I still be alive?".

A young girl with short brown hair and brown eyes walks into the room, "oh? Your awake, good morning". All Sarah can do is stare at her, she can't think of what to say.

"Sarah, was it? You can call me Heather. Your probably confused about everything that happened to you yesterday. Well, I'll explain". Heather then begins to explain about how no one can die, about there being basically no rules, and all sorts of things that can be done here. "From what happened to you yesterday, you probably came across a patch of blue dextrids. Each patch is actually one plant that shrinks and then eats it's prey. The "fairy" thing with the wings, was a side effect that the powder has on humans. As to why your still one, you must of been enjoying being like that when you technically died."

"As to your belongings, they were brought here, you can pick them up at any one of these revival stations. You are too small to use them, so we will still hold onto them. Well, that's everything. You can leave whenever you like".

Sarah gets out of bed and starts to fly towards the door. "Oh! just one second", Heather says, leaving the room then coming back a minute later. "I forgot that I was suppose to give you this". She hands her a small pair of panties, bra, and a mainly green with some other colored decorations dress. She hesitates to put them on, knowing that she intentionally gave her "fairy" clothes, but she doesn't want to stay naked, so she put them on.

She exits the revival station and floats up into the sky, above the city. She stops, and starts to think. "Okay, so I get whats going on and how this place works. I'm stuck like this until I want to be back to my normal self, not that i really mind. I kind of like being a "fairy"? I guess thats what I am, a small girl with wings.... Oh well....what to do.......".
1541211111121112.title: Respawned, clothed, and back outside.

15412111111211121.content:
She exits the town and finds that she was in CIRCUS TOWN A. She remembered this one from when she was looking down from the sky. This town had a lake right next to it with the river she was by passing through the town towards the lake.

That was when she remembered the river. She was overcome with wanting to go back there. "Guess I'm a river fairy, oh well, I want to go back so I will". Heading along the river, she finds the exact spot that she was in before she was eaten. "Ok, I wont stay so long this time".

Another hour passes as she explores river and it's surroundings. For some reason, she is really enjoying just flying around here, she can only think it's because of her transformation. But she doesn't give it a second thought, like she already said, she is enjoying every second of it.

What happens next?
15412111111211121.title: Drawn to the river.

154121111112111211.content:
30 minutes pass.

Someone/some people suddenly appear.....
154121111112111211.title: Someone appears.

1541211111121112111.content:
Sarah was simply flying around. She stops, just inches above the water and hovers there for a few seconds.
A hand suddenly grabs her. She lets out a surprised yelp as the fingers cover her body and she is lifted up.

She is brought face to face with her captor, and to Sarah's surprise, she knows him.

His name is Keith, Short brown hair, brown eyes, average height.

Sarah: K-Keith!?
Keith:.....Sarah? Is that you?

They stare at each other in silence for a few minutes.

Keith: Well, this is a surprise. To think that the fairy I caught is someone I know from school.

And with that, he removes an opened clear jar from a bag, stuffs Sarah into it, and screws the lid back on.

Sarah stands up in the jar, with her hands against the glass and stares up at him.

What does he do with her?
1541211111121112111.title: Keith

15412111111211121111.content:
Keith leaves the river and heads back into the city only to walk out the other side.

Keith: Sorry about this, but I was asked by my boss to bring her a fairy. Didn't matter if it was a natural one or a person turned into one, like yourself.

Sarah has been yelling and pounding on the glass from inside the jar, but no noise escapes from inside.

Keith: Oh, forgot to tell ya. You can hear me, but I can't hear you. That is a special jar that was made so that no noise escapes. Something about what is inside making too much noise.

He stops in front of a large manor, just outside of Circus Town A. "We're here", he says, and walks up to the door, opens it, and enters.

What is going to happen to Sarah!?
15412111111211121111.title: Taken to a building.

15412112.content:
You look at the paths laidt out to you by the circus, and head for the on surrounded by trees. You enter the dark forest, hearing nothing but the buzz of crickets and bugs, looking into the pure darkness as your heart started racing at the thoughts of what could be in the shadows. You keep walking deeper, waiting for the light to emerge, yet it keeps getting darker and you have been hear for a solid twenty minutes.

You hear the bugs even die out a small the forest is silent, except for the sound of your heart trembling against your breast in great freight. You continue however, only to her stopped by
15412112.title: Sarah's Story

154121121.content: You keep walking down the path, straight forward until you feel a sudden sting on your calf. You then hear something scurrying off. The pain only temporarily holds you back as you pull out your phone and examine your injury. You determine that what did it had to be a
154121121.title: Bitten

1541211211.content: You look at the swollen, red area, examining the injury trying to determine what creature could have done this to you. You hold the wound, determining that it had to have been a
1541211211.title: Bug

15412112112.content:
You hold up your cell phone light to the wound and immediately recognize the sting as a wasp's doing. You sigh in relief, as you thought that it was harmless. After all, wasps back home didn't need to be feared. But that was at home. You continue on your way down the path, feeling more and more soothed as you walk. You grow dizzy and lightheaded as you continue down the pathway towards the end. You feel your vision turn white before passing out, on the dark, wet ground.

When you come back to your vision, you feel incredibly strange. You are lying in a strange cloth, and something seems to be hanging off of your head. You look down and flip out as you see your lower body is that of a wasp. You then feel your wings flutter on your back as you flip out. (http://mertail.deviantart.com/art/Wasp-w...) You fly up, looking at the trees, deciding to get in the sun. You fly into the air, weaving in and out of branches using your new flying skills before you finally reach the light of day. You look around and see that there is a town to your left. Do you fly to the town, or stay in the woods?
15412112112.title: Wasp Woman

1543.content: Just some random road that leads somewhere.
1543.title: Other roads.

15431.content:
His name is Zack. Yellow hair, green eyes, smart, strong, a little on the short side.

Does he win 1 or more tickets?
15431.title: Zack

154311.content:
Zack had won a ticket to the Circus. He was excited, who wouldn't be? He pack some things to take with him and goes to bed. Waking up early the next morning, he grabs his thinks and takes off.

After handing the creepy guy at the gate his ticket, he is left with a choice. Which path will he choose? There are so many. He chooses a simple looking path that says it will take him to a place that splits into even more paths.

Along the way, he runs into something/someone.....
154311.title: Down the road.

1543111.content:
Zack makes his way down the road he chose.

Not watching where he was going, he runs into a girl who is coming from a side path.

She falls down and he is forced backwards.

???: Ow! Watch where your going!
"I'm sorry", he says, offering her his hand.

She takes it and he helps her to her feet. The girl checks herself out, and Zack immediately realizes that something was wrong when she feels her head, stops, then panics and goes over her head several times with both hands.

"I-is something wrong?".
???: It's gone!
"What's gone?".
???: My hairpin! And I just got it to!

Zack sees something out of the corner of his eye, on the ground, was a hairpin, but it was broken in two.
".....Is that it?", he says, pointing at the smashed hairpin.

She sees it, kneels down by it, and scoops up the pieces.

There is an awkward silence.

The girl then gets to her feet, and glares at Zack.
"I-I'm sorry! I should have been looking where I was going. I'll do anything to make it up to you".
The glare fades from the girl's face, "anything?".
"Yes, anything!".

The girl smiles, then.....
1543111.title: Collision with someone

15431111.content:
.....puts her face right in his. "I can tell your not a bad guy, and it was an accident, so I'll let you off easy". With a sigh of relief, the girl continues, "to pay me back for the hairpin, and I really liked that 1, I'll have you take it's place".
".....What?".

The girl is surprised at his response, "what do you mean what? I mean exactly what I said, your going to take the place of what you broke".
He just stares at her, confused.
???:D-did you just get here or something?
"Yeah. I haven't even been her for 10 minutes".

The girl gets a large grin on her face, "oh, this is just perfect. New people are so rare! I never thought I'd get to meet 1!".
"What are you talking about!?"
???: Don't you worry about it. I'll explain everything to you, once you start your punishment.

The girl then reaches into her bag and pulls out a small tied sack, "I bought this a little while ago, I didn't think I'd have a good reason to use it. I though I was just going to throw it on some random person".

The string that is keeping the small bag is removed and the girl throws the powder that was in the sack on Zack. Surprised, he steps back, and before he could say anything, the girl says 1 word, "hairpin".

As soon as she says this, he finds himself staring at the sky. (What happened?), he tries to say, but finds himself unable to. He then sees the girl come into view. She looks huge and is staring down at him.
She smiles, then reaches for him. Picking him up, she starts to talk, "your probably wondering what happened. Well I'll show you". She pulls out a mirror and shows it to him.

What was in the reflection was a yellow and green hairpin in the shape of several flowers.

???: Now lets be on our way. I'll tell you what I did, and about this place along the way. Oh, and I'm Lisa. Nice to meet ya, hairpin.
15431111.title: Lisa and the hairpin.

154312.content: How many tickets does Zack win?
154312.title: more than 1.

154321.content:
Average height, slightly more muscles than average. Short brown hair and brown eyes.

It was a Friday afternoon, with a three day weekend coming up, Brian was on his way home from his classes. About 1/2 way through his walk home, he sees a large crowd of people gathered around something.

Brian: What's this? Is something going on there?

Getting closer, he asks someone what was happening

Random person: Huh? Oh, it is something amazing! These two girls are giving away a ticket to the circus!
Brian: What!? Really! I probably won't win, but I have to try. No way I could pass this up, no matter how small the odds are.

After getting in line and waiting for almost 1/2 an hour, it is finally Brian's turn. The two girls that were running the lottery were twins that looked to be around his age. One had long silver hair, and the others hair was short; their eyes were blue with average breasts. Though they were wearing different outfits. The long haired twin was wearing a leotard, like an acrobat would wear. The other one was sort of wearing a clown suit, though it wasn't complete.

Twin 1: So your next, whats your name? I'm Seren and this is my sister Luna.
Brian: I'm Brian.
Seren: Ok Brian, as you probably already know, pick a number up there on the board. After each person takes a guess, we switch what is behind each door. So take your pick from the 100 numbers, and who knows! Maybe you'll be the lucky 1 to win the big prize! A ticket to the Circus!

Brian thinks decides on a number, "hmm....how about 24....".
Seren: Ok, show us what is behind number 24 Luna.

Luna simply nods and slowly brings her hand to Brian's pick. She grabs the little door with the number on it, and suddenly swings it open.

Brian couldn't believe his eyes. Right there, on the other side of the door was the ticket with a large WINNER printed on the board behind it. A loud celebratory music starts as balloons fall on top of him.

Seren: Congratulations! You have won the ticket to our Circus! Luna, please hand Brian the ticket". Luna nods and takes the ticket down and then hands it to Brian. She smiles and says in a monotone voice, "congratulations."

With cheers and some grumbles from the audience, the crowd disperses as the twins pull Brian to the side.

Seren: Finally! We have been at this all day!
Luna nods.
Seren: Again, congratulations on winning Brian!
Brain: T-thanks.....I can't believe I won.
With a grin Seren says, "oh, you think your happy now? Just wait until you see what the Circus is like!
Brian: What's it like? What do you mean?
Seren: Sorry, can't say anything about it outside of the Circus. You'll just have to see for yourself!
Luna: Yeah.
Seren: You have been given an extremely rare chance here! So go home and get ready, cause your life has just made a turn for the better. Your life will never be the same again!

After saying goodbye to the twins, he rushes home and quickly throws some supplies into a bag and makes his way to the Circus. After handing the creepy man at the gate his ticket he enters the mysterious place. There are signs everywhere and roads leading to who knows where. So, picking at random; he begins towards the direction he had picked.....
154321.title: Brian.

choices: Just in time for the next show.
1543211.content:
After about 10 or so minutes of walking, Brian arrives at where the sign had said. A giant red tent that is surrounded by lights, animals, buildings, equipment and people. He actually came to a circus in the circus.

Now Brian has been to a circus before, but this....it seemed....different. There were animals that he has never seen before, plants that were taller than people and some were moving on their own, even some of the visitors and circus staff looked different.

Brian:....T-this is...odd....I wonder how they can make these things so realistic?.....N-no way that this can be real.....

Captivated by all of the odd and interesting actions going around him, he snaps out of the trance that he was in and decides to check the place out. Shortly after he enters the beginning of this circus, a familiar voice calls out to him.

???: Brian!? Is that you?

Turning around, he sees a red and blue leotard coming for him.

???: It is you! Wow, what are the odds? This place is so big after all.

Looking up, he sees a familiar sight, long flowing silver hair. It was Seren.

Brian: S-Seren?
Seren: Yes, thats right.
Brian: What are you doing here!?
Seren: ? I work here. I'm an acrobat of this circus group here.
Brian: Really? Then that explains that you were wearing that yesterday.
Seren: Yep! It wasn't just to find a someone to give the ticket to. Oh! That's right! Luna is here as well. She helps out with the animals and is also one of our clowns.

She grabs his arm and starts to pull him.

Seren: Come on! Her next show is about to start! Let's go!
Brian: O-ok....

As She pulls him towards the main tent, she quickly says, "and again, congratulations on winning!".
Brian: T-thanks.
And she continues to force him towards the next show.....
1543211.title: A familar face.

15432111.content:
They get there just as Luna begins her next show and Seren leads him to a special seat backstage.

Loud cheering and clapping resound throughout the tent as Luna struts out to the middle of the ring. She is still wearing the same getup as the previous day. An incomplete clown suit with a red nose, a blue star under her left eye. With that blank look still on her face, she walks over to a large steel cage that had been placed there before she had made her appearance. Luna unlocks the cage and the door swings open. With her back to the now open cage, Luna takes a few steps forward as the creature steps outside of it's cage.

It is a giant brown and yellow frog. It too was dressed up in clown attire. It walks over to and stops at Luna's side. Some stage hands then bring out various props for her routine.

Brian: .....And what the heck is that!?
Seren: Oh...that's right! You just got here today. You don't know about any this.
Brian: Huh? What do you mean?
Seren: Well.....I'll tell you later. Just watch for now. The announcer is about to talk. Luna....isn't much of a talker.

Announcer: FOR OUR NEXT ACT IS OUR VERY OWN LUNA, MASTER OF BEASTS! IT IS SAID THAT THERE IS NO CREATURE ON THIS PLANET THAT SHE CAN NOT TAME! TAKE THE MONSTER AT HER SIDE. IT IS A DREADED SAND FROG. A FROG SPECIES THAT LIVES IN THE VARIOUS DESERTS IN THE CIRCUS. IT IS KNOWN FOR IT'S FEROCITY AS IT ALWAYS ATTACKS AND DEVOURS WHATEVER IT COMES ACROSS! AND YET SHE HAS COMPLETELY TAMED ONE! SO SIT BACK AND BE AMAZED BY HER SKILLS!

The crowd goes crazy as Luna begins. She snaps and the frog jumps to attention. She simply points to a row of targets that had been set up and the frog immediately fires it's tongue in quick succession, hitting each target dead center. Taking several large hoops, she starts tossing them up into the air and various heights, and each time her partner easily passes through each one. For the next half hour, Luna puts on quite a show. Displaying the sand frog's strength, speed, and agility.

As her show winds down, the frog lowers it's head and Luna jumps onto it. The frog then raises it's head back up and Luna bows to the audience. Once again the crowd goes wild. Luna then suddenly jumps straight and up, the frog then opens it's large mouth and it's tongue shoots out and wraps around Luna's waist. The frog closes it's mouth as Luna gets pulled in and swallows. It then walks back to and into it's cage as an attendant shuts and locks the door. With cheering and clapping from the crowd, Brian still can't believe what he just saw. He quickly turns to Seren.

Brian: It...it ate her!? I-is she going to be ok? How come no one is panicking.....just cheering.....and that frog. The way it was moving.....It's really alive!?
Seren: Yeah....well....just calm down.....I'll explain everything in a few minutes. But first let's go meet her.
Brian: Huh? Who?
Seren: Luna of course.
Briang: But she was just eaten.....
Seren: Just follow me. I'll explain everything once we're there.....
15432111.title: Beast Tamer Luna.

154321111.content:
Brian follows Seren out behind the tent and they head for a building that doesn't look like it belongs here. It was a single story small square building made of metal with only a few decorations. They head inside and Brian gets surprised for two entirely different reasons.

First, Luna wast there. Second.....she was getting dressed.

They both stare at each other, then blush bright red at the same time. Seren then grabs Brian and throws him outside, apologizing to him as she closes the door. A minute later, she opens the door and says that it is okay for him to come back inside. The three of them sit down at a table.

Brian: S-sorry about that.....
Seren: No, don't apologize, it was my fault for not checking.
Luna: ....Yeah.....don't worry about it.....

Seren then breaks the silence that followed.

Seren: Still....isn't it amazing that we met up with him Luna! Even though this place is so big!
Luna: Yes.....Did he watch my performance?
Seren: Yeah he did.
Brian: I was pretty surprised by it. That you were a beast master and then that giant frog thing eating you.
Seren: Oh, that's right! Brian here still doesn't know about this place, the Circus. We should show him around and tell him about it.
Luna nods.
Seren: First things first. You probably want to know why Luna is fine and how she ended up here.
Brian: Definitely.
Seren: Ok. This building that we are in is called a Revival Station. There is at least one near every main town, area, and so on. We have one here at our circus group, obviously, and there a few more scattered here and there.
Brian: Revival station. That sounds like something from a video game.
Seren: Yeah....well.....That isn't far off. You see.....as long as you are in the Circus....you cannot die.
Brian: What!?", he surprisingly says.
Seren: Yeah. Well you saw it for yourself. Luna was eaten by her pet and then she ended up here. She did technically "die". She was brought back here where she woke up in a new body.
Brian just stares at her, a dumbfounded look on his face.
Seran: Yeah.....I know it's hard to accept. But that is how it is. If something happens to you while you are in the Circus. You will wake up in a new body at the nearest Revival Station. You'll eventually get used to it.
Brian: T-that is a little hard to accept.
Luna: It is true.
Seren: Yeah.....Heh.....I just got a great idea.
Brian: What?
Seren: Why don't we just show you? It is a lot easier to acknowledge something when you experience it for yourself.
Luna: That is a good idea.
Brian: .....What?
Seren; Don't worry about it!", she says, smiling. "Just leave it to us!"

Seren and Luna both stand up. The two of them lead Brian out of the Revival Station and back outside.....
154321111.title: Meeting up with Luna.

1543211111.content:
Seren: We were born here. We've spent our entire lives within the walls that surround the Circus. Well, I say this, but even Luna and I have only seen a small portion of the entire place.
Brian: Really?
Luna: Yes.
Seren: The place is just that big. Though we do work in this circus here, we have had plenty of time to take trips around the place. I mean, we haven't even seen everything even here. New stuff gets added all the time. So lets just start here.
Brian: Alright, that seems like a good start.

Seren looks up and puts a finger on her chin, "so....where to start....oh! I know!", she then takes off in one direction while Luna and Brian follow. She stops in front of a highly decorated building with a large clown face at the entrance.

Seren: This fun house is perfect! Anything can happen inside. It is said that no two things can happen to a person at the same time now matter how many times they enter.
Luna: Good choice.
Brian: Really? If both of you say so, then lets get in line.

After a little bit of a wait, it is their turn to enter.....
1543211111.title: To Seren's choice.

choices: Stick together and pick this door.
15432111111.content:
With Luna and Seren on either side of him, Brian opens the clown face door.

The first room was pretty simple. There were clowns, mirrors, balloons, and other such similar objects. On the opposite side from where they entered are three doors.

Seren: Nothing is going to happen in this room. Think of it like a lobby. From here we choose what we will do. Which door should we pick? And should we split up or stick together. We need to decide before picking a door.
Luna nods at Brian once Seren finishes talking.
Brian: Ok. So what should we do?
15432111111.title: Into the Fun House.

154321111111.content:
Brian thinks for a little bit before coming to a decision. He turns to the twins and says, "I think we should stick together. We did decide to do this attraction together".
(This seems to make Luna and Seren happy)
Seren: Then we need to decide on a door.
Luna nods again.

They think for a moment, then decide to pick the middle door.

Brian opens and holds the door open for Seren and Luna as they walk into the room of their choice where anything could happen to them.....
154321111111.title: Stick together and pick this door.

1543211111111.content:
They step into the room and the door closes and locks behind them.

Brian: Its locked?
Seren: Yes. Once you leave the lobby you can only move forward until you make it to the end or something stops you. To get to the next room, you have to meet a certain condition for the one you are currently in. This can range from simply getting to the next door, finding a key, solving a puzzle, and so on. What you first should do is try to figure out what kind of room that you are in before proceeding.

He looks around the room. It is filled with all sorts of items and devices. It is a square shaped room with white carpet and pink walls. There are several pieces of furniture scattered across the room; such as a table with some drinks and food on it, a couch with a tv in front of it and a table next to it with a few magazines and a remote on it, and a closet that looks like it is filled with clothes.

While Brian carefully checks out the room, Seren looks at Luna and whispers to her, "I cant believe it! We actually ended up in a room that we have been to before". Luna nods in agreement. "Now what should we do?", Seren continues, "We could tell him about the room....or.....we could have a little fun with him.....".
1543211111111.title: A room they know.

15432111111111.content:
As Brian continues to check out the room, the twins come up with a plan to play a little prank on him.

He comes up to a large closet and opens it, that was when the pair made their move, they carefully sneak up behind him then shove him into the closet. He turns around only to see Seren giving him a large grin as they close the closet door.

Brian: W-what!? What are you 2 doing?
Seren: Just pulling a small prank on you", she says as both Luna and Seren make sure he cant get out, "Luna and I have already been to this room so we know what it does".
Luna: That's right.

Before he could say anything else, he feels something grab his leg. It was dark in that closet, barely any light was getting in. Brian squinted his eyes as he tried to see what was on him. He couldn't believe what he was seeing. It looks like a pair of pants had wrapped itself around his leg. A shirt then grabs his right arm and both articles of clothing begin to pull him away from the door. His struggles are in vain as more and more clothing continue to restrain him as well as pull him in deeper and deeper into the closet.

As the clothes continue to completely engulf his body, he starts to feel as though his body is on fire as his vision is cut off and everything truly goes dark.
15432111111111.title: A small prank.

154321111111111.content:
The closet doors open up and Brian falls out, still unconscious. Seren excitedly runs over to him and yells, " I cant believe it! It worked better than we thought! Who knew that "he" would look so good like this!". Luna nods in agreement.

Brian wakes up a few minutes later. Sitting up, he looks around and finds that he was still in the same room and that he had been moved to one of the couches in it. Putting a hand to his head, "wha-what happened? The last thing I remember....huh? My voice...does it sound higher?....!!!!!.....What the hell!?" he yells, as he notices something different.

There were now two large lumps sticking out from his chest. He grabs them, then sees that his arms are now thinner as well. Starting to panic, a strand of his hair falls into his face and it was far too long. Reaching up with his smaller arms, he finds that he now has long hair and that his face is softer and smaller as well. It then dawns on him what happened as he looks at the lower half of his body. His legs were smaller, his butt was bigger, and his groin was flat. He was now a she. A familiar voice then calls out to him.

???: Ah! Hey, Luna! Brian woke up!

He looks in the direction that the voice came from and sees Luna and Seren walking over to him.

Brian: S-Seren? Wha....something really weird has happened to me! I-I'm a girl now!? Why....how could something like this have happened!?
Seren just smiles at him and says, "I know!".
Brian: Wha-
Seren: You don't remember? Think about what happened before you passed out!

She tries to think back and his face shows a both confused and surprised look as he remembers that it was the two of them that had pushed him into the closet and the burning sensation he felt shortly after.

Brian: I-I remember! It was the two of you! Why did you do this to me?
Seren: What do you mean? We told you that we were going to show you what can happen in the Circus. It just happened earlier than we thought. Both Luna and I have already been to this room, which really surprised both of us. So we decided to play a harmless little prank on you!
Luna nods.
Brian: H-Harmless!? I'm a girl now! What the hell am I suppose to do with this body!?
Seren: What to do, huh....well just, get up and lets go to the next room!

Luna and Seren each grab one of her hands and pulls her to her feet. They then proceed to look her over.

Seren: Hmmm I still cant believe it! To think that you would look so good as a girl!
This surprises him, "what are you saying!?".
Luna: Yes. She is pretty.

They direct him to a tall standing mirror and she gets a big surprise. The reflection that was looking back was that of a slightly smaller girl with long brown hair, large breasts, and a killer body. No matter how she looked at her new self, she could not help but to think that she was very pretty, as Luna had said.

She blushes and both Seren and Luna smile as they pull her away and lead her to the exit to the room...
154321111111111.title: What happend to me!?

15432111111112.content:
Seren: On second thought....No....I want the three of us to go through something together. Not just by ourselves, though it would have been fun to see that happen.....So lets hurry and stop him from looking around the room before he triggers something and move on.
Luna: Yes.

They both run over to him.....
15432111111112.title: On second though....

154321111112.content: What will they decide on?
154321111112.title: A chance to think.

info.description:
A male/female middleschool/highschool student won a ticket to a famous circus. Gender, name, age, and what perspective is chosen by you.

1.no m/m
2.no serious pain/death
3.No gore,but stuff like scat,digestion,vore is ok if its lite.
4.I can edit/delete as i see fit.
5.Keep entries clean, grammer and stuff like that, mild cussing ok.
6.You can add short entries IF it continues something you have in mind, and No force endings, you can end, but give an option of continuing.
7.You can switch between 1st and 3rd and leave the main character behind, but come back to him/her in the end.
